trans-unit.source: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Angir informasjon om hvordan et dokument skrives ut, inkludert skriveren skriver den, når du skriver ut fra en Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you access a PrinterSettings through <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to modify printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du tilgang til en PrinterSettings via <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for å endre skriverinnstillingene som.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The most common printer setting is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, which specifies the printer to print to.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen vanligste er <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, som angir skriver til å skrive til.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om utskrift med Windows Forms den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Oversikt over navneområde.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å skrive ut fra en Windows presentasjon Foundation-programmet, kan du se den <xref:System.Printing>navneområde.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer alle felt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to set settings for the printer.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, oppretter du ikke en forekomst av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, men i stedet bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi innstillinger for skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om skriveren støtter begge sider utskrift.

trans-unit.source: To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> to one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> values.
trans-unit.target: Skriv ut med dupleks, og hvis skriveren støtter klientrepresentasjon, angi <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>til en av de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex>verdier.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer supports double-sided printing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis skriveren støtter begge sider utskrift. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om utskriften er Kollatert.

trans-unit.source: Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Sortering utføres bare når antall kopier er større enn 1.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to specify the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>til å angi hvor mange kopier til Skriv ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting Collate to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: Angi Collate til `true` skrives ut et fullstendig eksemplar av dokumentet før den første siden i neste eksemplar skrives.

trans-unit.source: `false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.
trans-unit.target: `false`skriver ut hver side av antall kopier angitt før du skriver ut neste side.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printed document is collated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utskriften er Kollatert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mange eksemplarer av dokumentet til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle skrivere støtter utskrift flere copes.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>til å fastslå hvor mange overfører skriveren støtter.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis antall kopier settes høyere enn de maksimale kopiene støttes av skriveren, bare maksimalt antall kopier skrives, og ingen unntak gjennomføres.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen skrivere støtter kanskje ikke skrive ut flere kopi om gangen.

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Antall eksemplarer.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Copies property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for Kopier egenskapen er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information that is useful when creating a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om som er nyttig når du oppretter en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the CreateMeasurementGraphics method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Du finner med metoden CreateMeasurementGraphics en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>for skriver uten å opprette en utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>foreta beslutninger om hvordan oppsett visuelle elementer som skrift, størrelse og stiler for en kompleks utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains information from a printer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon fra en skriver.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren navnet i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>egenskapen finnes ikke.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information, optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om, angi eventuelt origo ved margene.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Med den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>metoden, kan du få en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>for skriver uten å opprette en utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>ikke foreta beslutninger om hvordan oppsettet visuelle elementer som skrift, størrelse og stiler for en kompleks utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi origo ved margene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om skriver fra den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information associated with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om knyttet til den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Med den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>metoden, kan du få en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>for skriver uten å opprette en utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>ikke foreta beslutninger om hvordan oppsettet visuelle elementer som skrift, størrelse og stiler for en kompleks utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a graphics object for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> til å hente en grafikkobjekt for.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om skriver fra den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> associated with the specified page settings and optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> knyttet til de angitte sideinnstillingene og angi eventuelt origo ved margene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method allows you to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>metoden gjør det mulig å hente en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>for skriver uten å opprette en utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>ikke foreta beslutninger om hvordan oppsettet visuelle elementer som skrift, størrelse og stiler for en kompleks utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to retrieve a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> til å hente en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the origin at the margins; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi origo ved margene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that contains printer information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om skriver fra den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Henter standard sideinnstillinger for denne skriveren.

trans-unit.source: Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color.
trans-unit.target: Sideinnstillinger inkluderer størrelsen på margene på siden, størrelsen til å bruke og om å skrive ut i farger.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page settings, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om sideinnstillinger se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that represents the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> som representerer siden standardinnstillingene for denne skriveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innstillingen for begge sider utskrift.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> property to check to see if the printer supports duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>til å kontrollere om skriveren støtter dupleksutskrift.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: Standard bestemmes av skriveren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Duplex property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Duplex er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sidetallet for den første siden til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: FromPage og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>Egenskaper som brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>når brukeren velger en trykt området.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være satt til `true` slik at brukeren å angi en trykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the FromPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>krever den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>angis FromPage verdien være i dette området.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Under utskriften, i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen, visning av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>å finne ut hva som skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the FromPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>er <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, bruker du FromPage og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>til å fastsette hva sider skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>er <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, angi utdata bare for de valgte sidene.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FromPage, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: FromPage, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>kan også angi programmatisk, men den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementering er den samme.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Sidetallet på den første siden til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: The FromPage property's value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: FromPage egenskapsverdien er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en referanse til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> -strukturen som tilsvarer skriverinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`strukturene er enheten som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Kopiering av en `DEVMODE` strukturen fra en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>til en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>for en annen skriver ikke støttes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Når du er ferdig med referansen som er opprettet i denne metoden, du må oppheve tildeling av den selv ved å kalle opprinnelig Win32 `GlobalFree` metoden.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the GetHdevmode method.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller opp denne metoden, sende du som en parameter verdien som returneres av metoden GetHdevmode.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren navnet i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>egenskapen finnes ikke.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke hente skriverens initialisering av informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer and the page settings specified through the pageSettings parameter.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en referanse til en -strukturen som tilsvarer skriveren og sideinnstillinger angitt ved hjelp av pageSettings parameteren.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`strukturene er enheten som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Kopiering av en `DEVMODE` strukturen fra en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>til en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>for en annen skriver ikke støttes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Når du er ferdig med referansen som er opprettet i denne metoden, du må oppheve tildeling av den selv ved å kalle opprinnelig Win32 `GlobalFree` metoden.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller opp denne metoden, du sende som en parameter returverdien fra den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> object that the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure's handle corresponds to.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Når du er ferdig med referansen som er opprettet i denne metoden, du må oppheve tildeling av den selv ved å kalle opprinnelig Win32 `GlobalFree` metoden.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the GetHdevnames method.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller opp denne metoden, sende du som en parameter verdien som returneres av metoden GetHdevnames.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnene på alle skrivere som er installert på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke samlingen av installert skrivernavn for å gi brukeren mulighet til å angi skrivere til å skrive til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection> that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.

trans-unit.source: The available printers could not be enumerated.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke listes opp tilgjengelige skrivere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates the default printer, except when the user explicitly sets <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <> </> *> egenskapen angir standardskriver, bortsett fra når brukeren eksplisitt angir <> </> *>.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid IsDefaultPrinter `false` når du har angitt den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>egenskapen til en strengverdi enn `null`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om skriveren er en plotter.

trans-unit.source: A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based.
trans-unit.target: En plotter er en skriver som vektor basert i motsetning til rasterbaserte.

trans-unit.source: Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.
trans-unit.target: De fleste vektor-baserte skrivere Bruk individuelle tegneområdet penner til å produsere utdata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printer is a plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the printer is a raster.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis skriveren er en plotter; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis skriveren er en raster.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>egenskapen angir en gyldig skriver.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når du hente eller angi noen egenskaper, en gyldig skriver kreves, ellers oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To avoid exceptions, use the IsValid property after setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> to safely determine if the printer is valid.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå unntak ved å bruke egenskapen IsValid etter at du den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>å finne bare hvis den er ugyldig.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*> property designates a valid printer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>egenskapen angir en gyldig skriver; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Henter vinkel i grader, at stående roteres for å produsere liggende.

trans-unit.source: Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig rotasjon verdier er 90 og 270 grader.

trans-unit.source: If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Hvis liggende ikke støttes, er den eneste gyldige rotasjonsverdien 0 grader.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.
trans-unit.target: Du har angitt den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true` å skrive ut en side i liggende format.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen i grader, at stående roteres for å produsere liggende.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimalt antall kopier skriveren lar brukeren skrive ut om gangen.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>egenskapen antall kopier til Skriv ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the MaximumCopies property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.
trans-unit.target: Bruk MaximumCopies-egenskapen til å finne ut om skriveren støtter utskrift tilfellene om gangen, fordi noen skrivere ikke.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall kopier skriveren lar brukeren skrive ut om gangen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.

trans-unit.target: Vanligvis angir du en side arket størrelsen via den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen til en gyldig <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>tilgjengelig gjennom samlingen PaperSizes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>som representerer arket størrelser som støttes av denne skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Vanligvis angir du en side kilde via den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen til en gyldig <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>tilgjengelig gjennom samlingen PaperSources.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Når du har navnet på skriveren, kan du kalle <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A>å finne ut om navnet på skriveren gjenkjennes som en gyldig skriver på systemet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.target: Navnet på, ved utskrift til en fil.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page numbers that the user has specified to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sidetall brukeren som er angitt for å skrives.

trans-unit.source: The PrintRange property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PrintRange brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when brukeren velger en trykt området.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The default PrintRange is `AllPages`.
trans-unit.target: Standarden PrintRange `AllPages`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren til å angi en rekke sider skrive ut, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren til å angi de valgte sidene, skrive ut, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the PrintRange to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Under utskriften, i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen, Vis PrintRange til å finne ut hva som skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, bruker du <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>Egenskaper for å finne ut hva sider skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If PrintRange is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Hvis PrintRange <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, angi utdata bare for de valgte sidene.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and PrintRange can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A>og PrintRange kan også angis programmatisk, men den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementering er den samme.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value of the PrintRange property is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen PrintRange er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printing output is sent to a file instead of a port.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om utskrift utdataene sendes til en fil i stedet for en port.

trans-unit.source: The PrintToFile property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects the **Print to file** option.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PrintToFile brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>når brukeren velger den **Skriv til fil** alternativet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller ut-porten er satt til "Filen" fører til at delsystemet Windows utskrift be bruker om en fil når den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PrintToFile property is only used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and cannot be set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For PrintToFile egenskapen brukes bare av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>og kan ikke angis programmatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: The `Print to file` option only appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den `Print to file` alternativet vises bare på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utskrift utdataene sendes til en fil. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører relevant informasjon fra den angitte referansen og til den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific and copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE`strukturene er spesifikke for enheten og kopiere en `DEVMODE` strukturen fra en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>til en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>for en annen skriver ikke støttes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Referanse til en Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Skriver referansen er ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører relevant informasjon fra den angitte referansen og til den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Referanse til en Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVNAMES" name="DEVNAMES" href=""> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Skriver-referansen er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om skriveren støtter for utskrift.

trans-unit.source: To print using color, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Skriv ut med farge, og hvis skriveren støtter klientrepresentasjon, angi <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this printer supports color; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis skriveren støtter farger. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet for den siste siden til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>og ToPage egenskaper som brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>når brukeren velger en trykt området.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være satt til `true` slik at brukeren å angi en trykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> also requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the ToPage value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>krever også den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A>angis ToPage verdien være i dette området.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Under utskriften, i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen, visning av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>å finne ut hva som skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and ToPage properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>er <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, bruker du <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>og ToPage til å fastsette hva sider skal skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>er <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName>, angi utdata bare for de valgte sidene.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, ToPage og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A>kan også angi programmatisk, men den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>implementering er den samme.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Antall den siste siden til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ToPage property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for ToPage er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> in string form.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> i strengen skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: En streng.
